comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Hello HunnyPlay, i was looking to the 180% deposit bonus, and i don't have clear at all how it work, i hope you can help me to figure this out. After reading your Terms Of Service i found this formula:UnlockedAmount = Wager Amount * 3.33% * 5%so, let's say i depo $100, and i wager $1000 then my unlocked amount would be: 1000*0.033*0.05 = $1.65So, with that formula i have to wager $60,000 to unlock the $100 extra for the deposit bonus. And if that's right, then you have the biggest roll over in the gambling industry. I should be missing something, can you explain how that works?Source: https://docs.hunny.finance/products/hunnyplay/hunnyplay-terms-and-conditions

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: Quote from: seoincorporation on November 24, 2022, 02:47:04 PMHello HunnyPlay, i was looking to the 180% deposit bonus, and i don't have clear at all how it work, i hope you can help me to figure this out. After reading your Terms Of Service i found this formula:UnlockedAmount = Wager Amount * 3.33% * 5%so, let's say i depo $100, and i wager $1000 then my unlocked amount would be: 1000*0.033*0.05 = $1.65So, with that formula i have to wager $60,000 to unlock the $100 extra for the deposit bonus. And if that's right, then you have the biggest roll over in the gambling industry. I should be missing something, can you explain how that works?This is similar to what you can see in BC.GAME but with different number, in BC.GAME the formula to unlock is Wager*1%*20% You understand it correctly, and it looks like a high wagering requirement indeed but the benefit is that your deposit money is not locked, means that you can still withdraw your deposited money even if you have not complete the wagering requirement. We cant compare it to most common deposit bonus where your money is locked until you complete the wagering requirement. I do not mean to defend this new casino, just saying in general about the difference of such deposit bonus.
